channel.title: Umm drops on devolution help please
channel.description: ok well i got devolution source and i went to switch drop rate from 100 percent to 10 percent i uhh made it that it was just 10 insted of 100 id attack id log out made it 010 tried still did it help plese

item.title: Umm drops on devolution help please
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

they need to be different percents…use common sense. If you got them on the same percentage they’re gonna drop 100% make it like 4151 5% and 5214 6% and 995 100% and maybe add some bones at 100% too…

Read full topic
item.source: Umm drops on devolution help please

item.title: Umm drops on devolution help please
item.dc:creator: @Solid_snake1 Solid snake
item.description:
@Solid_snake1 wrote:

ok here ill explain more

npcdrop = 88 1308 1 100
npcdrop = 88 1040 1 100
npcdrop = 88 1042 1 100
npcdrop = 88 1044 1 100
npcdrop = 88 1046 1 100
npcdrop = 88 1048 1 100

drops look like that i tried this

npcdrop = 88 1308 1 10
npcdrop = 88 1040 1 10
npcdrop = 88 1042 1 10
npcdrop = 88 1044 1 10
npcdrop = 88 1046 1 10
npcdrop = 88 1048 1 10

didnt work made me log out

tried this
npcdrop = 88 1308 1 010
npcdrop = 88 1040 1 010
npcdrop = 88 1042 1 010
npcdrop = 88 1044 1 010
npcdrop = 88 1046 1 010
npcdrop = 88 1048 1 010
stil ldotn work!
